entries.name: def_extend_command(cmd_name, cmd_class, load_file = nil, *aliases)
entries.desc: Evaluate the given cmd_name on the given cmd_class Class.

entries.name: extend_object(obj)
entries.desc: Installs alias methods for the default irb commands on the given object using install_alias_method.

entries.name: install_alias_method(to, from, override = NO_OVERRIDE)
entries.desc: Installs alias methods for the default irb commands, see ::install_extend_commands.

entries.name: irb_load(*opts, &b)
entries.desc: Loads the given file similarly to Kernel#load, see IRB::IrbLoader#irb_load

entries.name: irb_require(*opts, &b)
entries.desc: Loads the given file similarly to Kernel#require
